playtimer.help:
/playtimer help -- shows this help message
/playtimer sync -- synchronize the timer with the server
/playtimer reset -- resets the timer to 00:00:00
/playtimer toggle -- hide or show the timer
text.autoconfig.playtimer.title: Playtimer Mod
text.autoconfig.playtimer.option.caption: Caption Colour
Set colour of timer
Playtimer Caption
Adds text to timer, like the '2nd attempt' in Grian's series
text.autoconfig.playtimer.option.playtim: Set position of timer to one of the 4 corners
text.autoconfig.playtimer.option.scalePe: Set scale of timer (change for different GUI Scales)
text.autoconfig.playtimer.option.useMill: Adds milliseconds to the end of the timer
